title: 【To International Students】 Scholarship sign-up schedule and dates of scholarship payment-November 2015 (Kyoto University)
text: ( Source : Kyoto University ) Japanese government ( MEXT : Monbukagakusho) Scholarship recipients, Honors Scholarship recipients and Japan-Korea Joint Government Scholarship recipients must sign a ledger at the designated office every month. The
